title: Ren. influence on Reformation, and Catholic reform

content.question: Directions: The suggested planning and writing time for this question is 35 minutes. Make sure that you are best prepared to answer the question thoroughly in the time permitted. You should spend 5 minutes organizing or outlining your answer. Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Evaluate the influence of Renaissance humanism on Catholic reforms and the Protestant Reformation.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
